subject: Football
College Athletics
Murders and Attempted Murders
organizations: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University
lead_paragraph: Much like the Yankees after Sept. 11, 2001, and the New Orleans Saints after Hurricane Katrina, Virginia Tech football has become inextricably linked to a tragedy and its healing process.
snippet: Much like the Yankees after Sept. 11, 2001, and the New Orleans Saints after Hurricane Katrina, Virginia Tech football has become inextricably linked to a tragedy and its healing process.
